data: Advanced Engineering and Materials Research Institute
New specialised structural integrity centre to develop and validate advanced engineering materials and low carbon energy innovations using full scale test structures currently unavailable in the UK.
Neath Port Talbot County Borough Council
To increase public transport use and promote economic growth, the Port Talbot transport hub will be a new integrated transport exchange next to Parkway Station
Neath Port Talbot County Borough Council

Development of a brownfield site in Port Talbot. Improving and constructing a road transport network. Developing existing and establishing new employment sites to act as a catalyst for economic and physical regeneration in the former industrial area.
Neath Port Talbot County Borough Council
Complementing the labour market programmes through a single co-ordinated approach to improving employability for individuals as a route out of poverty.
